fields.name: Treasury (Passive):
fields.value: The sum of all mafia members' scores each night is added to your treasury.

fields.name: Disburse Funds:
fields.value: For each 1% you spend from the Treasury, your target gains 1% charge on an ability of your choice.

fields.name: Conceal Cashflow (Charge 65%):
fields.value: Use during the evening phase. Before results, target a player, and they will be moved down 1 or 2 places (your choice) on the leaderboard. You will learn the exact score(s) of any player(s) moved by this ability.

fields.name: Embezzle (1x, Charge 85%):
fields.value: Use during the evening phase, before results. Your target will lose two tenths of their score, and the same amount will be added to your Treasury.

fields.name: Hire Hitman (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Spend 100 percentage points from the treasury, and you will astrally attack your target with 2.0x attack power.

fields.name: Evade Taxes (Passive):
fields.value: As long as you are alive, mafia members are immune to score-decreasing effects.

fields.name: Shell Corporation (Passive):
fields.value: Any investigations targeting you will receive a result indicating you are Town-aligned with no attack power. You are immune to roleblocks.
